sigma_name: New Service Creation via Service Control Tool
Qradar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\sc.exe' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '% create %')
(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and (EventID='1' and OriginalFileName='Adfind.exe') and not (Image ilike '%\Adfind.exe'))

sigma_name: Security Products Discovery via WMIC Tool
Qradar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\WMIC.exe' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%wmic%' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%Win32_systemDriver%' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%get%')

(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\schtasks.exe' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%create%' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%EventCacheManager%' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%Microsoft\Windows\SoftwareProtectionPlatform%')

sigma_name: System Information Discovery via Systeminfo Utility
Qradar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\systeminfo.exe')

sigma_name: Remote Desktop Connection via Mstsc Tool
Qradar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\mstsc.exe' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%mstsc% /v%')

sigma_name: Network Configuration Discovery via Native Tools
Qradar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and (Image ilike '%\nbtstat.exe' or Image ilike '%\arp.exe' or Image ilike '%\ipconfig.exe' or Image ilike '%\route.exe'))
(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\whoami.exe')

(LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\cmdkey.exe' and ("Process CommandLine" ilike '%generic%' or "Process CommandLine" ilike '%add%'))

sigma_name: RDP Authentication Bypass by Modifying AuthenticationLevelOverride Key Value in Registry
Qradar: (LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype)='Microsoft Windows Security Event Log' and EventID='4688' and Image ilike '%\reg.exe' and "Process CommandLine" ilike '%add% %\Software\Microsoft\Terminal Server Client% %AuthenticationLevelOverride%')
